title: List of all Android  development tutorial libraries for use in your project
meta: See collection of all Android  development tutorial libraries, filter by license, modified date, languages, and select best for your usecase.

repoList.name: KotlinEmojify
repoList.description: Android Face Detection using google play service vision, tutorial based on Udacity Advance Android Development App, Lesson 3: Libraries

repoList.name: Dagger2-ButterKnife-Retrofit-OkHttp-Picasso-Gson_Annotations
repoList.description: Third party librabries make developers' live way easy. They can significantly reduce the amount of code in your project. You can build robust apps by simply these libraries. In this tutorial I am going to introduce some very powerful libraries for android app development.  Lets do some reading practic first. Dagger-2-ButterKnife-Retrofit-OkHttp-Picasso-Gson-Annotations

repoList.name: Miwok
repoList.description: Miwok app tutorial, from Udacity. Helped me understand many android development concepts, such as using sound libraries, applying correct layouts, displaying images...

repoList.name: SpaceShooter
repoList.description: A flappy bird like space shooter game. Made for android without the use of any additional libraries. Made as part of and with help from the lectures and tutorial of the course 'Game Development for Android' at Uppsala University [http://www.uu.se/en/admissions/exchange/courses/list/course-description/?kKod=5SD061&typ=1]

repoList.name: Platformer
repoList.description: A platformer game made for android without the use of any additional libraries. Made as part of and with help from the lectures and tutorial of the course 'Game Development for Android' at Uppsala University [http://www.uu.se/en/admissions/exchange/courses/list/course-description/?kKod=5SD061&typ=1]
